ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians
ygData.msgSnippet: If he s really as big of a jerk as it sounds I d make him beg me to not have his own pet kill him.  If he s smart he ll have /pet suicide hot keyed and first
ygData.messageBody:
If he's really as big of a jerk as it sounds I'd make him beg me to not have
his own pet kill him. If he's smart he'll have /pet suicide hot keyed and
first time charm wears off he'll hit it furiously.

-----Original Message-----
From: beatdropbattledrum@...
[mailto:beatdropbattledrum@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 01, 2000 1:29 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: dueling magicians


Well, the original poster did say that this mage had let his pet kill
people in the past. It would just be giving him a taste of his own
medicine.

But how about this, let the pet beat the hell out of them, and at the
last minute before charm wears off and they die, pulse fear. Pet
runs, mage stays, and you finish them off. No exp lost either.

~Beatdrop

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, Jeffrey Sue <jsue@r...> wrote:
> I would say that having his pet kill him is a pretty jerk thing to
do, since that
> would cause him to lose experience. i would hope that people on
this list aren't that
> nasty that they would be advocating this.
